team_0110_cassiopeia_04a:
With its boss out of the picture, the Segin Squad
is pretty much done for.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_04b:
Now that its boss has been taken down, the Navi
Squad’s days are numbered.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_04c:
With its boss no longer around, the Ruchbah
Squad is as good as finished.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_04d:
Now that there’s no boss to lead them, the rest
of the Schedar Squad shouldn’t last long.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_04e:
Without its boss, the Caph Squad should be a
hair’s breadth from disbanding.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_06:
All five squad bosses have now been toppled
from their pedestals.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_07:
I imagine they’ll leave Team Star before long
now that they’ve lost their special positions.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_08:
After that, they should soon be back attending
classes at the academy.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_nelke_02: Cassiopeia! Well done to you, too.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_21:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Thanks. Now, about your reward,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
I’ll\r
transfer\r
some\r
LP\r
over\r
to\r
your\r
phone,\r
as promised.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_system_03:
You can now make more kinds of TMs using the
TM Machine!
team_0110_nelke_06:
Oh, that reminds me! I’m doing the whole supply-
unit-rep thing this time, right?[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_22:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Indeed. You can go ahead and give
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]\r
h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser\r
bonus\r
reward now.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_system_04: You received lots of Pokémon [VAR COLOR(0008)]materials[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
team_0110_cassiopeia_10:
At long last, Operation Starfall has entered its
final stage.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_11:
There’s only one thing left on the agenda.\c
You must defeat the big boss...and have Team
Star disband for good![VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_12:
Don’t worry—there’s no need to search them out.
The true identity of the big boss...[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_15:
I didn’t mean to keep it from you for so long, but
the right moment never came.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_16:
I’m the one who formed Team Star. Back then, the
members of the team were my closest friends...\r
and I treasured them more than anything.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_17:
If they go on like this, Team Star won’t do any
good for anyone.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_18:
They’ve got to give it up. So I’m using the code
we made together to force them to disband.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_19:
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]...\c
I’ll be waiting for you in the schoolyard
[VAR COLOR(0006)]after dark[VAR COLOR(0000)]. You should come as well, Clive.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_cassiopeia_20: Then I’ll see you both there.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0110_nelke_04:
So Cassiopeia was the big boss of Team Star this
whole time... I scarcely thought it possible.\c
But with this revelation, I just might have an
inkling as to their true identity...[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0110_nelke_05:
It seems we’ll find our answers after dark in the
academy’s schoolyard. Let’s prepare as best we\r
can before heading over.[VAR 0114(001E)]
